title: need help from rioter regarding chroma
body:
hello riot i have a question. a while ago i bought the warring kingdoms katarina icon and chroma with 5 gem stones though i did not have the skin - i was just dying to have the icon. i am wondering if i buy the skin now will i have the chroma? if not, is it too much trouble to be able to have the chroma gifted to me? it costed me 5 gem stones and unfortunately money to spend on league isn't a privilege i get to enjoy often, i understand if you can't but would deeply appreciate if you could help me here. please get back to me soon :) thanks in advance (Y)

ps i couldnt send this in riot support for some reason it said i had to log in before receiving a ticket though i was very much logged in, sorry

replies.body:
As far as I know the chroma will be available as soon as you unlock the skin.

As for support tickets the login for the support site is separate, and usually just pressing login and following the prompts is enough. Sometimes you might have to log out of the website (boards) before logging into support.

thank you so much for getting back to me! i am so grateful 
and thanks i'll keep that in mind for next time :D
